job.title: Machine Learning Engineer
job.description: Embark Trucks is a leading self-driving truck company bringing autonomous freight mainstream. We have raised $117m by partnering with Tiger Global ($70m Series C) and Sequoia Capital ($30m Series B) to help grow our team and introduce our technology to the public. Currently, we move freight daily between LA and Phoenix using our purpose-built transfer hubs. We have aligned ourselves with truck manufacturers , shippers, and carriers to integrate our technology into the freight ecosystem, pursuing a business model where fleets own and operate our trucks.
